subtitle: An anytime of the day pizza. If you don't have time to make the pizza base, simply buy one.

method.text: Mix the flours together in a mixing bowl. Stir in the rosemary, walnuts, seasoning, walnut or rapeseed oil and yeast.
Pour in just enough water to form a soft but not sticky dough. Knead the dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth.
Preheat oven to 220°C. Grease baking trays.

Roll out dough into 20 cm circles (one per seving). Place dough onto baking trays. Spread the sun-dried tomato puree onto each pizza. Top each pizza with the topping ingredients and drizzle over the oil. Season well.
Bake for 15-20 min or until well-risen and golden brown.
